title: A novel bio-template route to synthesize enzyme-immobilized MOF/LDH tubular magnetic micromotors and their application in water treatment
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,1142-1156
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00732D, Paper
Xiaohan Yang, Chenzhang Liu, Shuo Gao, Xiaolei Zhang, Ziwei Lan, Min Zuo, Jia Li
A ramie-templated micromotor loaded with a natural HRP enzyme was constructed, which had a potent peroxidase-like activity driven by decomposition of H2O2 for sensitive detection and degradation of catechol.
